Package io.sbk.logger.impl

Class SystemLogger

java.lang.Object
io.perl.logger.impl.ResultsLogger
io.sbk.logger.impl.SystemLogger
All Implemented Interfaces:
io.perl.api.ReportLatency, io.perl.logger.PerformanceLogger, io.perl.logger.Print, CountReaders, CountRW, CountWriters, Logger, RWLogger
Direct Known Subclasses:
CSVLogger, Sl4jResultLogger
public class SystemLogger extends io.perl.logger.impl.ResultsLogger implements RWLogger
Class for recoding/printing results on System.out.
